translation.en: ♪ I get up in the evening ♪
♪ And I ain't got nothing to say ♪
translation.es: Y no tengo nada que decir

translation.en: It really hasn't dated at all.
translation.es: No pasó de moda para nada.

translation.en: Don't let the fact that I've made A-team every year add to the pressure.
translation.es: No sientas presión porque siempre entro al equipo A.

translation.en: Can we please get this crap off?
-All right, mate. -Hey. You're not playing, Adam?
Sorry. It's Dads V Lads. I... forgot.
translation.es: Perdón. Hoy es papás contra chicos, lo olvidé.

translation.en: Right, it looks like we've found our goalie.
Here's to total humiliation by kids.
translation.es: Por la humillación ante los niños.

translation.en: Speak for yourself. I thought I had a good game.
translation.es: Habla por ti. Yo jugué bien.

translation.en: [Adam] Oh, god. He's putting up a flip chart.
translation.es: Por Dios. Está preparando un pizarrón.

translation.en: [man] Wait till he hands out the agenda.
Tell her I've been on teacher trips. I know what goes on.
translation.es: Dile que conozco las conferencias de maestros.

translation.en: [Corinne] Aw, it's tough, it's really tough.
I'm currently recuperating after a hot bath and two glasses of Rioja.
translation.es: Me estoy recuperando después de un baño caliente y dos copas de Rioja.

translation.en: Well, me and the boys are on a pub crawl.
translation.es: Los chicos y yo estamos en un bar.

translation.en: Hey, listen, did you know it was dads and lads?
Yeah, I wrote it on the note.
-What note? -The one that's attached to the fridge.
Listen, will you text me when you know which team he's on?
translation.es: Escríbeme cuando sepas en qué equipo está.

translation.en: Oh, God, I hope it's the A.
Tom's really winding him up, and this Ryan swearing thing...
translation.es: Tom le mete presión, y Ryan no para de maldecir.

translation.en: I know. God, it's a nightmare.
Potty-mouthed little prick. Takes after his mother.
translation.es: Un cabrón boca sucia. Salió a su madre.

translation.en: Ah, yeah, well, I'm... I'm just gutted I can't be there.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, estoy destrozada por no poder estar ahí.

translation.en: I think you've done this on purpose.
I don't think there even is a conference. I'm gonna ask the other teachers.
translation.es: No debe haber una conferencia. Les preguntaré a los maestros.

translation.en: Actually, know what? I better get going.
I have got dinner in half an hour.
translation.es: La cena es en media hora.

translation.en: All right, love. Well, you enjoy yourself.
Oh, yeah, I will. I fully intend to.
translation.es: Sí, es lo que pienso hacer.

translation.en: Wife left you to it, has she?
So have you got a kid playing in the match or what?
translation.es: ¿Tu hijo tiene un partido o qué?

translation.en: You didn't have to stay with her, you know.
translation.es: No tenías que quedarte con ella.

translation.en: Corinne. You didn't have to stay when she told you she was pregnant.
translation.es: Con Corinne. Cuando te dijo que estaba embarazada.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Do... do I know you?
Two years ago, she told you she was pregnant, right?
translation.es: Hace dos años te dijo que estaba embarazada.

translation.en: She told you she was pregnant and then she lost the baby.
translation.es: Te dijo que estaba embarazada y luego perdió el bebé.

translation.en: She made it up. She was never pregnant.
Who are you? Why are you saying this?
Think of me as a stranger. A stranger that knows.
translation.es: Considérame una extraña. Una extraña que sabe.

translation.en: She had a bump. It was fake.
Cast your mind back to that time. Did you ever see her naked?
translation.es: Piensa en esa época. ¿Alguna vez la viste desnuda?

translation.en: Excuses to avoid sex and sickness.
translation.es: Excusas para evitar el sexo y náuseas.

translation.en: When the miscarriage came, you look back and realized the pregnancy had been difficult from the start.
translation.es: Cuando perdió el bebé, pensarías que fue un embarazo complicado.

translation.en: How do you know my wife? Who the hell are you?
All right, folks, grab your beers.
Let's get this show on the road.
[sighs] Think of me as a friend that just released you from prison.
translation.es: Piensa en mí como una amiga que te sacó de la cárcel.

translation.en: -You should be thanking me. -Yeah? Why is that?
Because now you know she's a liar.
translation.es: Porque ahora sabes que es una mentirosa.

translation.en: If you need proof, look at your Visa card
translation.es: Si necesitas pruebas, revisa la tarjeta Visa

translation.en: and check for a charge to Novelty Funsy.
translation.es: y busca cargos de Bromas Funsy.

translation.en: I'd run DNA checks on your two boys.
translation.es: les haría una prueba de ADN a tus dos hijos.

translation.en: Hi, this is Corinne. Leave a message.
translation.es: Hola, soy Corinne. Deja un mensaje.
- Entró al equipo A. - Muy bien.

translation.en: Yeah, except Jimmy Hoch making the A's.
translation.es: Sí, pero Jimmy Hoch también quedó en el A.

translation.en: Ah, you know me, Adam. I'm not one for gossip. Bob lost his job.
translation.es: Me conoces, Adam. No soy chismoso. Bob perdió el trabajo.

translation.en: Six weeks ago. But he doesn't want anyone knowing.
translation.es: Hace seis semanas. No quiere que se sepa.

translation.en: Anyway, he has this headhunter helping him find a job.
translation.es: Un cazatalentos lo está ayudando a encontrar trabajo.

translation.en: Jimmy's dad? You're kidding. That's outrageous.
translation.es: ¿El papá de Jimmy? Es un escándalo.

translation.en: This shit happens all the time.
When it comes to looking after ourselves and our kids, then... [sucks teeth]
translation.es: Cuando se trata de cuidar a nuestros hijos...

translation.en: All right, see you tomorrow, mate.
She made it up. She was never pregnant.
Now you know she's a liar.
translation.es: Ahora sabes que es una mentirosa.

translation.en: [recorded voice] To help us deal with your call quickly,
please tell us in a few words why you are calling today.
translation.es: por favor, díganos por qué nos está llamando.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Could you repeat that?
-I'm sorry. Could you repeat that? -Speak to a fucking human being!
translation.es: - Disculpe... - ¡Quiero hablar con un ser humano!

translation.en: Please hold while we connect you to one of our representatives.
translation.es: Por favor, espere mientras lo comunicamos con un agente.

translation.en: Hello. My name's Peter. How can I help you today?
Yeah, there's a... there's a charge on my account
translation.es: Sí, hay un cargo en mi cuenta

translation.en: from a while back that I don't recognize.
translation.es: de hace tiempo que no recuerdo.

translation.en: I think it might be a mistake.
-What's the name of the company? -Novelty Funsy.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo se llama la compañía? - Bromas Funsy.

translation.en: And the date of the transaction?
Ah, yeah. Some companies don't bill under their real name.
translation.es: Algunas empresas no facturan con su nombre real.

translation.en: Yeah, like in hotels when adult movies appear as something else.
translation.es: Sí, como en los hoteles cuando ve películas para adultos.

translation.en: -Uh, so what is it? -It's an online retailer,
translation.es: - ¿Qué es? - Es una tienda en línea,

translation.en: so I'll need to raise a specific inquiry if you're sure this is something that you didn't purchase.
translation.es: así que debo investigar si está seguro de que no les compró nada.

translation.en: I'll raise the inquiry. Can we get back to you on this number?
translation.es: Le avisaremos. ¿Lo llamamos a este número?

translation.en: -Is it okay if Daisy stays? -I'll sleep in the spare room.
translation.es: - ¿Daisy puede quedarse? - Dormiré en el otro cuarto.

translation.en: Did you ask your mum? Yeah, she's cool with it.
translation.es: - ¿Le preguntaste a tu mamá? - Sí, está de acuerdo.

translation.en: Brother of their star player. It was inevitable.
translation.es: El hermano del jugador estrella. Era inevitable.

translation.en: -I don't want it to be a big thing. -It won't.
This is a very casual kiss.
translation.es: Este es un beso muy informal.

translation.en: [woman 2] Oh, my God. How was it?
Just the truth. You know, I said that--
translation.es: Solo la verdad. Le dije que...

translation.en: Sit! Now come here. Now, sit!

translation.es: Le dije que estuvimos 26 años juntos.

translation.en: Many of them happy, and that's not a failure, that's a success.
translation.es: La mayoría, felices. Eso no es un fracaso, es un éxito.

translation.en: But, you know, now it's time for something else.
translation.es: Pero ya es hora de otra cosa.

translation.en: I tried a new house analogy,
translation.es: Usé una analogía con una casa nueva,

translation.en: but that all got a bit muddled.
Hard to tell with Phil. He slept in the spare room,
translation.es: Con Phil no se sabe. Durmió en el cuarto libre,

translation.en: but I think that was mostly symbolic.
translation.es: pero creo que fue algo simbólico.

translation.en: Sorry, the infant keeps calling me. I better find out what he wants.
translation.es: El bebé no para de llamarme. Mejor veo qué quiere.

translation.en: I'll tell you what it is, some fucking weird shit.
translation.es: Te diré qué pasa. Algo rarísimo.

translation.en: What are you doing on that thing?
Ooh, you're showing your age now, Jo.
It's Johanna. How many times with that?
translation.es: Soy Johanna. Ya te lo dije.

translation.en: And anyway, I thought you liked us oldies.
translation.es: Igual, pensé que te gustaban las viejitas.

translation.en: He's not that old. He's not, like, your age.
translation.es: Él no es tan viejo como tú.

translation.en: You said your new man was old enough to be your father.
translation.es: Dijiste que su padre podría ser el tuyo.

translation.en: Yes, technically, but you're actually old enough to be my mother.
translation.es: Sí, técnicamente, pero tú podrías ser mi madre.

translation.en: No. No, it's just that, lying there like that.
translation.es: No. Solo vimos eso. Ahí tirado.

translation.en: Oh, it's giving me the creeps.

translation.es: - No, el cuello es demasiado largo. - ¿Una jirafa?

translation.en: What do you think's going on there, on the leg?
-Are they bite marks? -[bystander 2] I can't look anymore.
And judging from the size and the shape of the indents...
translation.es: Y por el tamaño y la forma...

translation.en: I'd say there's a reasonable chance that they're human.
translation.es: ...diría que podrían ser de un humano.
Él es al agente Wesley Ross.

translation.en: We're just looking into an incident about a mile or so from here
translation.es: Ocurrió un incidente a un kilómetro de aquí

translation.en: which involves an animal. Looks very much like a white alpaca.
translation.es: con un animal parecido a una alpaca.

translation.en: You think it's one of mine?
Well, logic dictates. You know, they're not the most common--
translation.es: Sería lo lógico. No son muy comunes...

translation.en: Uh, I-- I'm afraid so. Yes, I'm... I'm sorry.
translation.es: Me temo que sí. Lo lamento.

translation.en: Have you got any CCTV? You know, any...
It's an alpaca farm, not Port Knox.
translation.es: Es una granja de alpacas, no Port Knox.

translation.en: It's "Fort" Knox. It's where the Americans keep their gold.
translation.es: Es "Fort" Knox. Donde guardan el oro en Estados Unidos.

translation.en: [man] It's Martin. That Parth fella has just turned up.
translation.es: Soy Martin. Vino ese tal Parth.

translation.en: -[man 2] Is someone there? -[Martin] He's down there.
[man 2] It's not fucking Silence of the Lambs.
translation.es: No es El silencio de los inocentes.

translation.en: Professionally speaking, I have to tell you that this is...
translation.es: Como profesional, debo decirte que es...

translation.en: Well, you are kind of holding him against his will.
translation.es: Lo estás reteniendo contra su voluntad.

translation.en: I was a cop for 30 years, Adam.
-I understand the definition of kidnap. -[distant banging]
-The door closed behind him. -[man 2] Let me out!
translation.es: - Se le cerró la puerta. - ¡Déjenme salir!

translation.en: But remember whose side you're on.
translation.es: Pero recuerda de qué lado estás.

translation.en: All right! All right! All right!
Are you fucking kidding me? I've been down there nearly an hour.
translation.es: ¿Me está jodiendo? Estuve ahí una hora.

translation.en: You're crazy. He's crazy. Okay, just calm down.
translation.es: - Está loco. Es un loco. - Cálmese.

translation.en: Calm down? I'm calling the police.
translation.es: ¿Que me calme? Llamaré a la policía.

translation.en: -Give me me phone. -I haven't got it.
translation.es: - Deme mi teléfono. - No lo tengo.

translation.en: -Give him his phone. -He's stolen me fuckin' phone!
You are. He's an old man that doesn't want to move.
translation.es: Es un anciano que no quiere mudarse.

translation.en: Doesn't wanna sell. He's not interested in your redevelopment program.
translation.es: No quiere vender. No le interesa la reurbanización.

translation.en: And he really doesn't appreciate you showing up here unannounced,
translation.es: Y no le gusta que venga sin avisar

translation.en: waving your big, fat, corporate checkbook around.
translation.es: por más dinero que le ofrezca.

translation.en: Now, we've lodged our objection, we've adhered to the deadline,
translation.es: Presentamos la objeción, cumplimos el plazo.

translation.en: and now due process needs to take place.
And due process can be very, very slow.
translation.es: Y el proceso puede ser muy, muy lento.

translation.en: Okay, you're his lawyer. How much does he want?
translation.es: Muy bien, usted es su abogado. ¿Cuánto quiere?

translation.en: I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized to go as high as 400,000.
translation.es: No debería decirle esto, pero me autorizaron a pagar 400 000.

translation.en: I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized
translation.es: No debería decirle esto, pero me autorizaron a rechazar cualquier oferta.

translation.en: to say no to whatever you offer.
translation.es: pero me autorizaron a rechazar cualquier oferta.

translation.en: He can't win, the stupid, old fuck! And tricks like that...
translation.es: Ese viejo de mierda no puede ganar. Y esos trucos...

translation.en: You know and I know, everyone's got their price.
translation.es: Sabes muy bien que todos tienen su precio.

translation.en: And in the end, trust me,
-You think she sleeps with her alpacas? -[Johanna] Nope.

translation.es: No hablo de sexo, solo abrazos.

translation.en: Maybe gets one in now and again on a cold winter's night.
translation.es: Quizá deje entrar a alguna en invierno.

translation.en: I know a lad who used to sleep with a massive red setter,
translation.es: Conozco a alguien que dormía con un setter.

translation.en: like, under the covers, its head on his pillow.
translation.es: Todo tapadito y con la cabeza en la almohada.

translation.en: I said, "Is that not a little--" Stop!

translation.es: Hay huellas. No de zapatos, de pies.

translation.en: [Johanna] Get an ambulance and call for backup!
Hi. It's Hashim from Derwent Bank.
translation.es: Hola. Soy Hashim del Banco Derwent.

translation.en: I believe you put in a request last night
for the identity of a company that has the billing name...
translation.es: sobre una compañía que factura con el nombre...

translation.en: Right. Well, I'm afraid we can't identify exactly what the payment relates to.
translation.es: Me temo que no podemos identificar a qué se debió el pago.

translation.en: It seems to be an umbrella title that covers several different websites.
translation.es: Parece ser una compañía que vende desde varios sitios web.

translation.en: I've got a list of the ISP addresses, which I'm happy to send you,
but obviously, I can't identify which of these,
if any, is the source of the purchase.
Would you like me to email this to the address we have on file?
translation.es: ¿Quiere que le envíe la lista a su correo?
- Ya se la mando. - Por favor.

translation.en: Yeah. The lunch thing got canceled.
translation.es: Sí. Lo del almuerzo se canceló.

translation.en: Oh, come here. Let me hug you.
God, none of your friends are watching.
translation.es: No te están viendo tus amigos.

translation.en: How was the conference? Did Selena behave herself?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal la conferencia? ¿Selena se portó bien?

translation.en: right up until the point she dashed outside to vomit.
translation.es: hasta que salió corriendo a vomitar.

translation.en: -Yeah, I'll do it. -Come on, I wanna hear all about footy.
translation.es: - Yo lo preparo. - Cuéntame sobre el fútbol.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, she stayed the night.
[woman] I need her to look after Ella for an hour.
She was supposed to play hockey but suddenly decided--
translation.es: Debía jugar al hockey, pero decidió...

translation.en: [woman] Okay. Well, she's got a stomach ache.
Doesn't feel well, doesn't want to play.
However, I've got a training run. Triathlon's in three weeks.
translation.es: Pero tengo que entrenar para el triatlón.

translation.en: If you're sick I need to make sure you're with someone.
translation.es: Si estás enferma, no quiero que estés sola.

translation.en: It's all right. We can take her for an hour.
Ugh. I don't know what's wrong with her.
Doesn't want to go to school, doesn't want to play sports.
translation.es: No quiere estudiar ni hacer deportes.

translation.en: -She's making up the tummy ache thing. -You know, she's at that age.
translation.es: - Está inventando el dolor de panza. - Es la edad.

translation.en: Want me to try talking to her?
I supposed it could be worse. Did you hear about Dante?
translation.es: Supongo que podría ser peor. ¿Oíste lo de Dante?

translation.en: He didn't come home last night.
I was having a surrogate pregnancy.
to pretend that I was going through the normal cycles.
translation.es: para fingir que estaba pasando por las etapas normales.

translation.en: I'm just showing him what teachers get up to outside of school.
translation.es: Le muestro lo que hacemos las maestras afuera de la escuela.

translation.en: -What the hell are you talking about? -Can we just skip this part?
translation.es: - ¿De qué demonios hablas? - Obviemos esa parte.

translation.en: -What? -The part where you pretend not to know
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Donde finges no saber de qué hablo.

translation.en: what I'm talking about. Let's just skip the denials, okay?
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Donde finges no saber de qué hablo. Obviemos las negaciones.

translation.en: I know you faked your pregnancy.
Well, if you know, why are you asking?
Are you out of your mind?
You faked a pregnancy, Corinne. What else are you capable of?
translation.es: Fingiste un embarazo. ¿De qué más eres capaz?

translation.en: Look at Tom's face, your eyes, your-- your-- your hair.
translation.es: Mira la cara de Tom. Tiene tus ojos, tu cabello.

translation.en: How... How can you even ask me that?
What makes you think I faked a pregnancy?
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que fingí el embarazo?

translation.en: It's a cover name for a fake pregnancy website.
translation.es: Es el nombre de una web de embarazos falsos.

translation.en: -Right. How do you know that was for me? -Was it?
translation.es: - Claro. ¿Cómo sabes que fue para mí? - ¿Lo fue?

translation.en: What are you even doing looking through bank statements--?
Now, you better start talking right now.
translation.es: Mejor que empieces a hablar ahora mismo.

translation.en: Do you remember when I had two school periods off during lunch?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando tenía horas libres durante el almuerzo?

translation.en: Well, I used to get out of school for a couple of hours.
translation.es: Me iba unas horas de la escuela.

translation.en: I'd go to that café in Portis Books.
translation.es: Iba al café de la librería Portis.

translation.en: I'd get a cup of tea, sit in the corner reading,
translation.es: Pedía un té, me sentaba en un rincón,

translation.en: and after a while, Adam, you become a regular.
translation.es: y después de un tiempo, te vuelves un cliente habitual.

translation.en: The same people will be there like a community--
She was eight months pregnant. It was her first baby.
translation.es: Tenía ocho meses de embarazo. Era su primer bebé.

translation.en: You know how young mothers-to-be are, all glowing
translation.es: Ya sabes cómo son las embarazadas, radiantes,

translation.en: and over the top like they're the first person to get pregnant--
translation.es: como si fueran las primeras en tener un bebé.

translation.en: Great story. Can we get back to the fucking elephant sat here?
translation.es: Qué buena historia. ¿Podemos ir a lo importante?

translation.en: Can you just drop the sarcasm, Adam?
I'm trying to tell you something.
And then one day she just stopped coming.
translation.es: Y un día dejó de ir.

translation.en: Now, I... I just assumed she'd had the baby. She was way overdue.
translation.es: Supuse que había tenido al bebé. Estaba muy retrasado.

translation.en: But she didn't reply to any of my messages.
And she just killed all my calls--
-Is this going somewhere? -A few months later,
I saw her again in Starbucks near the library and she was pregnant.
translation.es: la vi en Starbucks, cerca de la biblioteca, y estaba embarazada.

translation.en: Heavily pregnant, Adam, like eight months.
translation.es: Muy embarazada, como de ocho meses.

translation.en: Well, it didn't make any sense.
So I just-- I held back and I watched her.
translation.es: Así que la observé de lejos.

translation.en: And she was with this group of other women in the corner
translation.es: Estaba con otras mujeres en el rincón.

translation.en: holding court, talking to them about... about baby names.
translation.es: Todas le prestaban atención y hablaban sobre nombres de bebés.

translation.en: And when she saw me she just looked terrified.
translation.es: Y cuando me vio, se veía aterrorizada.

translation.en: Did you say something to her?
She told me some story about having a stillborn. I don't know if it was true--
translation.es: Me contó sobre un bebé que nació muerto. No sé si era cierto.

translation.en: Corinne, what are you talking about?
No, no, Corinne, that is not normal behavior.
translation.es: No, Corinne, no es un comportamiento normal.

translation.en: Yeah, well, she said her husband didn't care about her. She had no--
translation.es: Dijo que su marido la ignoraba. No tenía hijos.

translation.en: What does this got to do with us? You've got children, got me.
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene que ver con nosotros? Tienes hijos y a mí.

translation.en: Crazy Suzanne and her shitty little life made you think, "I'll fake a baby."
translation.es: Suzanne la loca te hizo pensar: "Voy a fingir un embarazo".

translation.en: Why would you fake a baby, Corinne?
For attention? Is this some kind of deranged midlife crisis?
translation.es: ¿Por atención? ¿Es una crisis de la mediana edad?

translation.en: But you need to tell me everything from start to finish--
translation.es: Pero tienes que decirme todo, porque ahora...

translation.en: -You're not just gonna walk away. -What are you gonna do? Keep me captive?
translation.es: - No te irás. - ¿Qué vas a hacer? ¿Secuestrarme?

translation.en: I need some time. Just tell me!
What are you gonna do, Adam? Beat it out of me?
translation.es: ¿Qué vas a hacer, Adam? ¿Sacármelo a golpes?

translation.en: A woman, a stranger. I've never seen her before.
-She came up to me and she-- -What woman?
I've just told you, a stranger. How does she know any of this?
translation.es: Acabo de decirlo, una extraña. ¿Cómo supo todo esto?

translation.en: And you, what, you just believed her?
I will, I promise, but just...

translation.es: Hay indicios de lesión cerebral leve.

translation.en: Could've hit a tree, could've been something else.
translation.es: Quizá se golpeó con un árbol, no lo saben.

translation.en: They're guessing he'd been there for hours.
translation.es: Creen que estuvo ahí varias horas.

translation.en: We pushed through those trees clothed. They're hard to get through.
translation.es: Porque es difícil pasar por esos árboles vestido.

translation.en: You aren't darting through at speed and falling down that drop,
translation.es: No te lanzas a gran velocidad.

translation.en: you're coming through slowly, thinking, "Whoa, big drop."
-But if it was dark-- -If it was dark, you'd go even slower.
translation.es: - Pero de noche... - Irías más despacio.
Más con el pito al aire.

translation.en: Hey, trust me, this is my area of expertise.
He's run through the woods shedding his clothes.
translation.es: Corrió por el bosque quitándose la ropa.

translation.en: Turned on by mutilating an alpaca.
translation.es: - Se excitó mutilando una alpaca. - Si hay relación.
- Se excitó mutilando una alpaca. - Si hay relación. ¿Si la hay?

translation.en: -Let's not jump to conclusions. -No, no, sure.
I mean, two really bizarre events happen within a mile of each other.
translation.es: Dos sucesos muy raros ocurren a un kilómetro de distancia.

translation.en: Let's find out who he is first. Check for misper calls.
translation.es: Primero veamos quién es. Busquemos gente desaparecida.

translation.en: Someone must be worried this one didn't come home last night.
translation.es: Alguien debe estar preocupado porque este no llegó a casa.

translation.en: Just what I need. Thank you.
I'll tell you what, I won't miss the snoring.
translation.es: No voy a extrañar los ronquidos.

translation.en: He's in the spare room and it's still, like, a thousand decibels.
translation.es: Estaba en el otro cuarto y aún eran como mil decibeles.

translation.en: "Like, a thousand decibels." That infant's rubbing off on you.
translation.es: "Como mil decibeles". Ese bebé se te pegó.

translation.en: There's another good reason to retire.
Come on. I mean, you're gonna be out of a job.
You're out of your marriage. We always said we'd do it, Johanna.
translation.es: Ya no tendrás marido. Dijimos que lo haríamos, Johanna.

translation.en: Yeah, which can be looked after. And two dogs.
translation.es: Alguien se ocupará. También tengo dos perros.

translation.en: And a husband that can look after them.
translation.es: Y un marido que puede cuidarlos.

translation.en: Me and you, Thelma and Louise across the states.
translation.es: Tú y yo. Thelma y Louise recorriendo Estados Unidos.

translation.en: All we've gotta do is book the flights and we're doing it.
translation.es: Solo tenemos que reservar los vuelos.

translation.en: [in Southern accent] "I'm in deep shit, Thelma.
translation.es: "Estoy con la soga al cuello, Thelma.
Con la soga al cuello, en Arkansas".

translation.en: What you said yesterday, you were right.
translation.es: Tenías razón en lo de ayer.

translation.en: And I want to explain, I do.
We have this school awards thing tonight.
translation.es: Hoy entregan los premios en la escuela.

translation.en: Why don't we just eat after at Juniper Yard?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no cenamos después en Juniper Yard?

translation.en: We can eat and I'll talk, and then...
translation.es: Podemos comer, te cuento todo y luego...

translation.en: then we can see where we are.
You know the worst part about all of this?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué es lo peor de todo esto?

translation.en: We all have our secrets, Adam.
His name's Dante Gunnarsson. His parents reported him missing yesterday.
translation.es: Se llama Dante Gunnarsson. Sus padres denunciaron la desaparición ayer.

translation.en: He spends a lot of time out and about so they weren't immediately concerned.
translation.es: Pasa mucho tiempo afuera, por eso no se preocuparon.

translation.en: He's stable but unresponsive. They're doing an EEG this morning.
translation.es: Está estable pero inconsciente. Le hicieron un EEG.

translation.en: "The lacerations on the animal are from human teeth."
translation.es: "Las heridas del animal son de dientes humanos".

translation.en: "Human bite is usually an elliptical injury.
However, in this case, the pattern is interrupted
translation.es: Pero en este caso, el patrón se ve interrumpido

translation.en: by the absence of a left bicuspid."
translation.es: por la ausencia de un premolar izquierdo".

translation.en: Our boy has all his teeth.
Have you seen Corinne? Nowhere, no.
Oh, Vicky, can I have a word?
I just wanted to ask, and it's probably not a huge deal,
translation.es: Quería preguntarte algo. Seguro que no es grave,

translation.en: but your Ella, she's stopped talking with Mia.
translation.es: pero Ella y Mia ya no se hablan.

translation.en: And Mia said something's happened, but she won't say what it is.
translation.es: Mia me dijo que pasó algo, pero no quiere decir qué.

translation.en: Do you have any idea what's going on?
I just thought you should know.
She's been a bit down but...
-Hi. This is Corinne. Leave a message. -[beeps]
translation.es: Hola. Soy Corinne. Deja un mensaje.

translation.en: Sadly, I must begin this evening of celebration with some difficult news.
translation.es: Debo comenzar esta noche de celebración con una noticia triste.

translation.en: One of our year 12 pupils, Dante Gunnarsson,
translation.es: Un alumno del 12.o grado, Dante Gunnarsson,

translation.en: has been involved in a serious accident.
And I'm afraid he's in a very worrying condition.
translation.es: Y me temo que su estado es preocupante.

translation.en: I'm sure you will all join me in wishing him and his family
translation.es: Estoy segura de que todos le deseamos a él y a su familia

translation.en: all the best for his swift recovery.
translation.es: lo mejor y una pronta recuperación.

translation.en: and this evening is about celebrating
translation.es: y esta noche es para premiar

translation.en: or excelled... in this, their final year, of high school.
translation.es: y a los que hayan sobresalido en su último año de secundaria.

translation.en: And the award for art goes to Kiran Penvell.
translation.es: El premio al arte es para Kiran Penvell.
Michelle Vosler. PREMIO A LA MÚSICA

translation.en: And the one you've all been waiting for,

translation.es: El premio a la ropa interior más visible...

translation.en: The award for best sporting achievement goes to Anthony Carter.
translation.es: El premio al mejor logro deportivo es para Anthony Carter.

translation.en: The final award this evening is our award, the students',
translation.es: El premio final de esta noche lo entregamos los estudiantes.

translation.en: and we were asked to vote for our teacher of the year.
translation.es: Nos pidieron que votáramos por el profesor del año.

translation.en: And I've been asked to say
that it has been a really close competition, as they're all so great.
translation.es: que ha sido una competencia muy reñida porque todos son geniales.

translation.en: Sadly, there can only be one winner.
translation.es: Pero solo puede haber un ganador.
No soy la señora Price, obviamente.

translation.en: Uh, Corinne can't be here tonight.
But I'd just like to say how much this'll mean to her. She...
translation.es: Pero esto va a significar mucho para ella.

translation.en: loves this job, it's her life, and, uh...
translation.es: Ella ama su trabajo, es su vida, y...

translation.en: she's always cherished the work that she does...
encouraging you lot to fall in love with...
And as her husband, her passion and...
translation.es: Y como su esposo, su pasión y...

translation.en: But I will give this to her
and she can come and tell you herself when she feels better.
translation.es: y vendrá a decirles lo mismo cuando se sienta mejor.

translation.en: -How can you not know where she is? -Well, do you?
translation.es: - ¿Cómo no sabes dónde está? - ¿Lo sabes tú?

translation.en: Mum just didn't feel up to it tonight.
translation.es: Mamá no tenía ganas de salir esta noche.

translation.en: Now you know she's a liar.
translation.es: Ahora sabes que es una mentirosa.
